turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi Rachel, are you busy? I could use some Starbucks coffee right about now

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sounds great! What can I order you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'm gonna try a White Chocolate Mocha like the one you had yesterday

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You will like it. What size would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Venti

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: With whipped cream?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, you know it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Oh wait, what kind of milk would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Let's go with whole milk

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I have mine with only half the syrup so it's not too sweet. Do you want yours like that too?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, half the syrup is fine

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Do you want to try that on ice?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Rachel, it's winter. No, just no.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Speaking of winter, traffic is pretty bad right now because of the snow.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I can pick up from the store on 430 Prairie Center Drive in Eden Prairie, MN. It's right next to the freeway.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I have a Venti White Chocolate Mocha with whole milk, whipped cream and half the syrup on order for you

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Perfect

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Your order will be ready for pickup shortly at the Eden Prairie store on 430 Prairie Center Drive

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Will I get a receipt?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Your receipt will be via text message to your cell phone

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Awesome, thank you. You're the best!
